topic: Spread and Rest Operators in JavaScript

content.text: Spread and rest operators are two features that were introduced in ES6 and have become very popular in modern JavaScript development. They both use the same syntax, which is the three dots '...' symbol, but they have different uses.
The spread operator is sometimes referred to as the 'three dots operator' because of its syntax.

content.question: What is the purpose of the spread operator?
options: To combine two or more arrays into a single array
To split a string into an array of characters
To create a new object with the properties of an existing object
To create a new function from an existing function
content.answer: To combine two or more arrays into a single array
